location.heading: The View: A Hidden Gem in the Heart of Nature
location.description:
Perched atop a secluded hill in the Belgian Ardennes, The View offers unparalleled privacy and breathtaking panoramic vistas. Our unique location at the edge of the natural park ensures you're surrounded by pristine wilderness while enjoying all the comforts of premium accommodation.

From your private terrace, watch the sunrise paint the valleys in golden hues, or unwind in the evening as the forest comes alive with the sounds of nature. This is more than accommodation—it's your gateway to reconnecting with the natural world.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Everything you need to know about your stay

amenities.question: What amenities does The View offer?
amenities.answer: The View offers a private sauna, a bubble bath, breathtaking views, and a complete smart home experience, including a romance mode with customized lighting and music.

capacity.question: How many people can stay at The View?
capacity.answer: The lodge is designed for a maximum of two people, offering the perfect setting for an intimate and romantic retreat.

pets.question: Can I bring my pet or child?
pets.answer: Pets are not allowed. Infants are welcome, but The View is primarily designed as a romantic getaway for adults.

booking.question: How can I book my stay at The View?
booking.answer: You can check availability and book your stay directly on our website, theviewlodge.be/#book

essentials.question: Do I need to bring essentials with me?
essentials.answer: No, The View provides toiletries, towels, and bedding, ensuring a worry-free and comfortable stay.

yearRound.question: Is The View accessible year-round?
yearRound.answer: Yes, The View is open year-round, offering unique experiences in each season, from cozy winters to vibrant summer getaways.

activities.question: What activities are available nearby?
activities.answer: You can enjoy hiking trails that start directly from the cabin in the Parc des Sources. Additionally, the cabin is 5 minutes from La Gleize, 15 minutes from Plopsa Coo, 20 minutes from Spa (thermal baths, restaurants), and 30 minutes from the Francorchamps circuit.

privacy.question: How private is the location?
privacy.answer: The cabin is the last dwelling perched at the top of a hill, located right at the edge of the natural park, offering perfect privacy and serenity.

kitchen.question: What is included in the kitchen?
kitchen.answer: The kitchen is fully equipped with all the essentials for cooking, including a microwave, a traditional oven, a dishwasher, a large refrigerator & freezer, an induction hob, and more.

publicTransport.question: Is public transport available to reach The View?
publicTransport.answer: Yes, The View is accessible by public transport. We are a 5-minute walk from the TEC Stoumont Targnon bus stop, served by line 142 (limited daily departures). This line connects to several SNCB train stations: Coo, Trois Ponts, and Aywaille, which offer easy access to Liège and Brussels with trains every hour on weekdays and every two hours on weekends. Contact us to see if arranging a transfer is possible.

activities.heading: Around The View
activities.subheading: Discover the natural beauty and attractions around The View

fagnes.title: Les Fagnes
fagnes.subtitle: Wild Natural Beauty
fagnes.description: Explore the vast open landscapes of Les Fagnes, a unique highland region near The View. Perfect for hiking and wildlife watching, its serene marshlands and panoramic views offer a true escape into nature.
fagnes.imageAlt: Panoramic landscape of Les Fagnes with wooden boardwalk

parcDesSources.title: Parc des Sources
parcDesSources.subtitle: Nature at Your Doorstep
parcDesSources.description: Step into Parc des Sources, a vast protected forest surrounding The View. With its scenic hiking trails and peaceful environment, it's perfect for nature walks, wildlife observation, and moments of tranquility in the heart of the Ardennes.
parcDesSources.imageAlt: Forest trail in Parc des Sources

spa.title: The Town of Spa
spa.subtitle: Wellness and Charm
spa.description: Discover the historic town of Spa, famous for its thermal waters and wellness heritage. Enjoy world-class spa treatments, charming streets, and local cuisine in this UNESCO World Heritage site.

francorchamps.title: Francorchamps Circuit
francorchamps.subtitle: Thrills on the Track
francorchamps.description: Experience the adrenaline of the Spa-Francorchamps Circuit, just 30 minutes from The View. Famous for its Formula 1 races and iconic corners, it's a must-visit destination for motorsport enthusiasts.

ninglinspo.title: Ninglinspo Gorge
ninglinspo.subtitle: Natural Wonder
ninglinspo.description: Discover the breathtaking beauty of Ninglinspo, Belgium's most spectacular waterfall gorge. Follow the scenic hiking trail along cascading waterfalls and through dramatic rock formations in this protected natural area.
